feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
